title: Realfi
description: How do we integrate Cardano with the existing financial systems?

f6_assessments.q0:
Integrating Cardano with the existing financial systems aligns with the Cardano mission of shaping legislation and commercial standards.
I strongly agree this challenge is critical to achieve Cardano's mission.
f6_assessments.q1:
El Salvador, Cuba and Ukraine are all in various stages of adopting Bitcoin as legal currency. Cardano is the third largest cryptocurrency with several advantages over Bitcoin and Ethereum. There are many reasons for countries with low income or unstable currencies to adopt cryptocurrency. Cardano already has partnerships in Africa which has several suitable countries. Conceptually this should be achievable and with the recent El Salvador news the fear off missing out by other countries is likely to be high. Achieving this challenge would certainly make any "ghost chain" accusations seem absurd.
I agree that the Catalyst community has the capacity to address the challenge.
f6_assessments.q2:
The success criteria are relevant to the challenge question. The key metrics are relevant to the success criteria. The metrics are all or nothing with no spectrum of success.
I agree that the success criteria and suggested metrics are set correctly to measure progress in addressing the challenge.

importance: There is a big AFK world out there.
success: Cardano is used as the base layer for running the future financial networks.
